channel.title: Wassenar Arrangement on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in Wassenar Arrangement on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: Recommendation of the Council Concerning Guidelines for Cryptography Policy (adopted by the Council at its 895th session on 27 March 1997 [C/M(97)6/PROV])
Wassenaar Arrangement on Export Controls for Conventional Arms and Dual-Use Goods and Technologies
item.description: Published: December 1995 Abstract: The Wassenaar Arrangement, an arrangement from 1996 between 33 nations seeking to create consistent and transparent policy on encryption, and to promote security. This document contains the declarations, guidelines, and procedures that governed the agreement. It provides detail and specifics on the functioning of the arrangement.

item.title: What is the Wassenaar Arrangement?
item.description: Published: February 2020 URL: https://www.wassenaar.org/the-wassenaar-arrangement/ Abstract: This brief explainer provides a background on the Wassenaar Arrangement, an arrangement from 1996 between 33 nations seeking to create consistent and transparent policy on encryption and to promote security.
